SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Race

java.lang.Object
cycling.Race
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Race extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a race in a cycling event, containing various stages and results of participants.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Olly Johnson and Laith Al Qudah
See Also:

    • Race

      public Race(int id, String name, String description)
      Constructor to initialize a race with an ID, name, and description.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the race.
      name - The name of the race.
      description - A description of the race.

      public String toString()
      Provides a string representation of the race with its basic details.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string containing the race's ID, name, description, and stages.

      Retrieves all stages in the race as an array.

      An array of Stage objects in the race.

    • riderHasResult

      public boolean riderHasResult(int riderId)
      Checks if a rider has results recorded in this race.
      Parameters:
      riderId - The ID of the rider to check.
      Returns:
      true if the rider has results in the race, false otherwise.

    • getOverallResult

      public Result getOverallResult(int riderId)
      Retrieves the overall result for a rider in this race.
      Parameters:
      riderId - The ID of the rider whose results are being queried.
      Returns:
      The overall result object for the rider.

    • addOverallResult

      public void addOverallResult(int riderId, Result raceResult)
      Adds or updates the overall result of a rider in the race.
      Parameters:
      riderId - The ID of the rider whose result is being added or updated.
      raceResult - The result object containing the rider's performance data.

    • removeRiderResults

      public void removeRiderResults(int riderId)

      riderId - The ID of the rider whose result is being added or updated.

    • getSortedListOfResults

      public ArrayList<Result> getSortedListOfResults()
      Gets a sorted list of results for all riders in the race, based on their performance.
      Returns:
      A sorted ArrayList of Result objects.

    • getSortedListOfTimes

      public LocalTime[] getSortedListOfTimes()
      Retrieves a sorted list of times for all riders in the race.
      Returns:
      An array of LocalTime objects representing the sorted times.

    • getRiderIdsByTotalTime

      public int[] getRiderIdsByTotalTime()
      Gets an array of rider IDs sorted by their total time in the race.
      Returns:
      An array of rider IDs, ordered by performance.

    • getTotalPoints

      public int[] getTotalPoints()
      Calculates and returns the total points for all riders in the race.
      Returns:
      An array of points for each rider, sorted by their performance.

    • getMountainPoints

      public int[] getMountainPoints()
      Retrieves the total mountain points for all riders in the race.
      Returns:
      An array of mountain points, sorted by the riders' performance.

    • getRiderIdsByPoints

      public int[] getRiderIdsByPoints()
      Gets an array of rider IDs sorted by their points in the race.
      Returns:
      An array of rider IDs, sorted by the total points they have earned.

    • getRiderIdsByMountainPoints

      public int[] getRiderIdsByMountainPoints()
      Retrieves the rider IDs sorted by their mountain points in the race.
      Returns:
      An array of rider IDs, sorted by their mountain points.
